sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - விழுங்கு, விழுங்கப்பார், உட்கொள்ளு, வாஞ்சி, வாரிஇறை, தீவிரி
1) to gasp, to pant, to pant after, to long for, to breathe heavily;
a) to gasp, to pant after, to snuff up
b) to gasp or to pant (with desire), to pant after, to be eager for
c) to thirst for one's blood (from the actions of animals) (figurative)
2) to crush, to trample, to trample upon (Qal) to trample upon, to crush

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to inhale eagerly; figuratively to covet; by implication to be angry; also to hasten: - desire (earnestly), devour, haste, pant, snuff up, swallow up.
